channel.title: Hidden Safe
channel.description: ok step 1 get a can of whip cream or lysol anything with the bottom like lysol take and get all of the air out of the can and then take a can opener to the bottom and cut it off and wash and dry it out and then place ur valuables or anything you dont want found or stolen and place the bottom back on and seal it with epoxy and place it among many others but make sure to mark it in some small way so it will not get lost or thrown away

item.title: Hidden Safe
item.dc:creator: @s1aped s1aped
item.description:
@s1aped wrote:

i did that and my mum through it away with £100 init

Read full topic

item.title: Hidden Safe
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

You can get mildly high from the nitrous in a whipped cream can… nothing compared to a couple of fat balloons though

Read full topic

item.title: Hidden Safe
item.dc:creator: @Blackester Blackester
item.description:
@Blackester wrote:

[quote=“deoxys505, post:11, topic:36679”][quote author=jcs_double link=topic=52201.msg647812#msg647812 date=1166519884]

There is no air in whipped cream cans, there is Nitrous Oxide. Thought I’d just throw that random fact in there, so people didn’t empty it into the air when they could be having fun with it.

No wonder every time i eat whipped cream or puncture the cans i start laughing uncontrollably
[/quote]

lol my bro got high off of the whip cream can[/quote]

lmfao lightweight FTW?

Read full topic

item.title: Hidden Safe
item.dc:creator: @tom55 tom55
item.description:
@tom55 wrote:

My friend did this with one of his cans of air duster (stuff for keyboards and junk) and he tried it without emptying it out FULLY.
So he opened it up just a bit and it thrusted out that stuff that is really cold and got it all over his arm and torso. Sucks for him, he said it was like dry ice or something. His arm had so many blisters though.
Moral=EMIT THE INSIDE OF COMPRESSED CANS, THEN OPEN. Yes this did really happen to my friend!

Read full topic
